name: Super Scooter Fraud
description:
Intense Trailer-man Voice

In a time… When income inequality is at record heights.
In a country… Where a staggering percentage of the citizenry can go bankrupt from health insurance costs…
In a world… where tech startup corporations can scatter battery-powered electric scooters across every city street… Overnight…
In an era… where the new iPhone and an avocado toast costs like LITERALLY A THOUSAND DOLLARS…

You.
Must find a way… to survive.

Gather thy good health, young one.
SCOOT forth into traffic, COLLIDE with the wealthiest among us and EARN that sweet CA$H MONEY courtesy of our BROKE-ASS health insurance system.

------Control instruction:-------

w - forward 

s - back 

a - left

d - right 

*If you have a  PS4 controller to play with, square and X are forward and back, respectively. 

------Credits:-----

Programming: Arthur Lee & Adrian Bocanegra

Music: Toby Rodriguez 

Sound Effects: Fernando Valadez 

Audio Implementer: Michael Kim

Visual Art: Daniel Kim
